column1: 資料來源： 行政院主計總處「家庭收支調查報告」。
column7: Source：  Directorate-General of Budget, Accounting and Statistics, Executive Yuan. Report on the survey of family income and

column1: 說       明： 家庭收支調查報告每年8月發布上一年度資料,若需最新數據,請連結至行政院主計總處網站

column7: Note：  Annual Family Income and Expenditure Survey Report publishes on August. If you need the latest figures, please connect to
the website of Directorate-General of Budget,Accounting and Statistics Executive Yuan
